SEARCH
Package org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.graphics

Interface Shape

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ellipse, Line, Picture, Rectangle, Text
public interface Shape
A shape that can be drawn on a canvas.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete()
    Deletes the shape from screen

    Draws the shape

    • grow

      void grow(double dw, double dh)
      Changes the size of the shape
      Parameters:
      dw - the amount by which to resize the width on each side
      dh - the amount by which to resize the height on each side
